overview:
Rory Martin (www.rorymartin.com) has over a decade of expertise building and running interactive marketing and web design firms. His client list includes small, medium, and Fortune 1000 companies like Intel, Microsoft, Classmates.com, HTC, Genentech, Accenture, T-Mobile, Motorola

Rory Martin is focused on creating Social Media Strategies that reflect your unique brand and culture, as well as meeting your business goals and objectives. We clearly define your target audience, research where they are interacting and engaging, and build an effective, results-oriented program for connecting with them online. Our online marketing campaigns deliver both measureable revenue as well as ancillary brand building benefits for your company. Rory Martin will help you realize the value of your social media marketing campaigns and will deliver ROI you can count on.
